text: Janam is a 1993 Indian Malayalam film, directed by Viji Thampi and starring Murali and Geetha in lead roles. ==Cast== * Murali as Balachandran * Geetha as Susheela * Siddique as Sivan * Jagadish as Harikrishnan * Thilakan as D.G.P Thomas Mathew * Sukumaran as Luckose * Rajan P. Dev as Dasappan * Rekha as Gomathiyamma * Jagathy Sreekumar as Vazhuthala Sasi * Janardhanan as K. Divakaran * Jose Pellissery as Nair * Karamana Janardanan Nair as Ananthan * K. B. Ganesh Kumar as Mahesh * K. P. A. C. Lalitha as Devaki * Narendra Prasad as Azheekkal Raghavan * K. P. A. C. Azeez as I.G Madhavan Nair * Kollam Thulasi as Mathachan * Jagannatha Varma as City Police Commissioner Fernandez * Mamukkoya as Minister Janab Koyakkutty Sahib * Indrans as Sasi's Assistant *Bheeman Raghu as Firoz * Kamal Gaur as Khalid Settu * Seetha as Sreedevi * Malavika as Reshma *Kaladi Omana as Lakshmiyamma * Manu Varma as Ramesh Venu *James as Shaji * Kukku Parameshwaran as Anjana *Aliyar as Party Leader ==References== ==External links== * Category:1993 films Category:Indian films Category:1990s Malayalam-language films Category:Films directed by Viji Thampi
title: Janam (1993 film)
